title: I can't spectate anyone on new client
body: I can't spectate anyone on new client, it stays greyed out.

replies.body:
Spectate mode has not been implemented into the new client. It's one of the more high priority features so it shouldn't be too far off.

In the mean time you can still switch back tot he legacy client from the login page.

ahh cool didnt know i could switch back

thank you
